page.title: 15RETIRED DOCTOR
page.content: Dr. Hart came from Scotland in 1953. He had only one partner then but the practice now has 11 doctors and has 30,000 patients.As a doctor on call his day started with morning surgery from 9a.m._11a.m.Then came house calls until lunchtime and again in the afternoon.Evening surgery was from 4p.m._6p.m.and he was on call until midnight.Then each doctor took it in turn to go to emergency night calls. With more doctors the work load is shared and he even had days off! He never had a mining disaster to deal with but once a miner blew himself up whilst laying explosives.He was also police surgeon and dealt with many road accidents.Patients today,he believes,will not accept minor illnesses but call the doctor for the least thing.
